Adam can introduce you to 12 people at Apple

Helping start-ups and established software companies build systems that take advantage of machine learning to improve and automate their businesses.I also write online about Machine Learning at https://www.machinelearningisfun.com/.
Independent author developing online courses that teach Software Engineers how to build Machine Learning systems

I led the platform team that built and rolled out Groupon's new Node.js-based web application framework and replaced the existing monolithic platform in 30 countries. Read about it here: https://engineering.groupon.com/2013/misc/i-tier-dismantling-the-monoliths/I also led and worked on several other teams in my time at Groupon:* Rebuilt Groupon's Merchant Portal from scratch in 2012 (https://techcrunch.com/2012/01/04/groupon-customer-satisfaction/)* Led Groupon's API dev team (that powers all web/mobile traffic) through a successful Black Friday/Holiday 2016* Built systems for mobile app native deep-linking and various web-to-mobile interactions * Led a team researching and experimenting with new mobile (iOS / Android) technologies* Built and launched several products (both consumer-facing and infrastructure-related) across the SOA architecture
Co-founder and Chief Technical Officer for Tucuxi Software, the leader in visualization software in the Emergency Management field.  Tuxuci Software was acquired by Intermedix Corporation.

Led development of the flagship emergency management product WebEOC 6.5.  Led design and development of the visualization application Mapper Professonal.  Founding member and CTO of ESi's spin-off company Tucuxi Software.
Received the President's Undergraduate Research Award for work in the area of multiple input computer interaction.

recommendations: January 11, 2017, Eliel worked with Adam in different groups

I've worked with Adam in several projects through the past years and I have a clear picture about him. If I have to summarize his attributes I'd say he is great and one of the best guys I know in Groupon.He has the perfect mix of:- Expertise. He has deep understanding of all the code, technologies, infrastructure, hardware, EVERYTHING related to his work.- Generosity. Always willing to share his time and knowledge.- Great attitude. He is very kind, friendly and respectful.He is a great professional and even better person, I'm truly honored for working with him. Any company would be lucky of having him as employee and leader.

January 11, 2017, Adam was senior to Eliel but didn’t manage directly

I've worked with Eliel on quite a few large projects that he managed, including migrating Groupon's entire distributed SOA platform to a new data center. Eliel is great at organizing complicated projects across multiple teams and making sure everything gets delivered on time and communicated clearly. He's also easy and fun to work with and he is a great addition to any company. I'd be happy to work with him again in the future!

January 8, 2016, Alvaro worked with Adam in the same group

Alvaro is a joy to work with. He's smart, dependable and has a great personality. He's able to bring together people in large organizations to make things happen quickly while still focusing on delivering a great product for the customer. In particular, Alvaro is a great asset when working in a distributed, SOA environment because he understands how the product requirements map to the services that are available and he's able to untangle the dependences that inevitably arise to make sure everyone delivers on schedule.
